details: Thesis: Web service for people with Alzheimers disease training.
Research and development of **Python** apps/scripts/plugins for automation of ADVA products CI/CD process and SVT/SIT testing.
Implementation of ADVA core system emulator used by developers, testers and automated continuous integration systems. Implemented using: **Docker** and **Python**.
Co-creation and maintaining of internal release notes documentation system.
Co-creation and maintaining of an extensible framework for completely automated software promotion, releasing, packaging.
Development of CI/CD architecture utilizing technologies such as **Jenkins**, **Artifactory**, **GitLab** and **AWS EC2**.
Developing unit and integration test for internal Python modules utilizing **PyTest**, **Mock** and **Flake8**
Maintaining ADVA core system emulator used by developers, testers and automated continuous integration systems. Implemented using: **VirtualBox**, **Vagrant** and **Ruby**
Design and development of web applications with **RubyOnRails** and **AngularJS**.
Preparing the environment on the servers for hosting **RubyOnRails** applications.

items.name: pdf-resume-builder
items.details: Simple, stateless, single-page application for generating PDF resume from JSON data. This very resume was generated utilizing pdf-resume-builder.

items.name: fastapi-mvc-template
items.details: FastAPI project boilerplate implemented using MVC architectural pattern with base utilities, tests, and pipeline to speed up creation of new projects.

items.name: Home Kubernetes cluster
items.details: Made of 5x Rock64 boards (worker nodes), orchestrated via Ansible. k3s master is located on a separate Raspberry Pi4 board, and together they create my home k3s Kubernetes cluster. I use it for all my off-work projects, and it's an opportunity to further excel my knowledge about Kubernetes and the Cloud-Native approach. I really like to learn things by simply doing it, hence the home cluster. Everything is monitored by Prometheus + Grafana stack, deployed with helm using kube-prometheus-stack operator.

items.name: Stocker
items.details: Stock exchange bot capable of analysis, backtests, automatic buy and sell with extensible model and data interfaces. It supports horizontal scaling, due to multiprocessing implementation. The bot utilizes modules such as Pandas, Plotly, click, or requests. This project uses local k3s cluster for Job and CronJob workloads types. Mainly processing thousands of bot backtest strategy configurations or simply doing daily analysis.

items.name: MedNote
items.details: Simple web application made for an esthetic clinic with a separate frontend (Vuejs + Vuetify) and backend (Rais, PostgreSQL). Application is orchestrated using Ansible. Used in production for nearly two years since its first release. Moreover, I prepared the infrastructure and environment for the web application for the clinic, currently hosted on bare-metal CentOS-based machines. For development and testing, I am using home k3s cluster.

items.name: Onlineangebot
items.details: Simple, stateless, single-page application for reserving removals.

items.name: ImageCrypt
items.details: [In progress, pre release - only LSB] Python CLI module for LSB and DCT image steganography.
